entities.Description: Markets where electricity, natural gas, and other energy commodities are bought and sold.
Government ministries responsible for energy-related policies and regulations.
Agencies that promote and support the development and use of renewable energy sources.
The use of less energy to provide the same level of output or service, resulting in reduced energy consumption, cost savings, and environmental benefits.
The process of capturing and storing energy for later use.
Organizations that focus on energy issues within a specific region.

relations.Description: Energy tax incentives are implemented by the Energy Efficiency Policy to promote the adoption of energy-saving practices.

relations.Description: Energy tax incentives provide funding for renewable energy projects to support the transition to clean energy sources.

relations.Description: Energy tax incentives focus on promoting energy efficiency measures to reduce energy consumption and greenhouse gas emissions.

relations.Description: Energy tax incentives are included in the National Energy Policy to incentivize sustainable energy practices.

relations.Description: Energy tax incentives partner with Energy Service Companies to provide energy efficiency solutions to consumers.

relations.Description: Energy tax incentives contribute to improving energy access by promoting the development of renewable energy projects.

relations.Description: Energy tax incentives are monitored to assess their impact on energy consumption and the effectiveness of energy-saving measures.

energy efficiency
relations.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

relations.Subject: energy efficiency
relations.Description: Energy efficiency employs energy audits to identify energy-saving opportunities and optimize energy use.

relations.Subject: renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

relations.Subject: renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies collaborate with research institutions to advance scientific knowledge and develop new technologies for renewable energy generation.

relations.Subject: energy markets
relations.Description: Energy markets address the issue of energy access by ensuring the availability and affordability of energy sources for all segments of society.

relations.Subject: energy markets
relations.Description: Energy markets collaborate with government agencies to develop and implement policies and regulations that promote a sustainable and efficient energy sector.

relations.Subject: energy ministries
relations.Description: Energy ministries address the issue of energy access by implementing policies and initiatives to ensure reliable and affordable energy for all.

relations.Subject: energy ministries
relations.Description: Energy ministries collaborate with international organizations to exchange best practices and coordinate efforts in addressing global energy challenges.

relations.Subject: energy storage
relations.Description: Energy storage addresses the issue of intermittency in renewable energy sources by storing excess energy for use during periods of low generation.
